kep.util module¶

Helper functions.

kep.util.make_label(name: str, unit: str) → str¶

Concat variable name and unit.

Return:
str, like „CPI_rog“
kep.util.iterate(x) → list¶

Mask string as [x] list.

kep.util.timestamp(year: int, month: int) → str¶
